column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////We were seated in the larger backroom
column3: including the two staff members. My sister picked the middle package (paella
column7: french toast) and it was ALL delicious. The guests (and myself!) could not stop raving about how good it was
column8: and the service was phenomenal. We did a drink package for two hours
column9: and the servers were very prompt with filling the drinks that no one even noticed when the bar service ended.
